==Notes==
* Each trial must be completed in 30 minutes or less
* After completing each trial at least once, a combat record will show on the trial page, showing several stats:
** Completion Time Record
** Strongest Single Strike
** Least DMG taken
** A stat unique to each trial
*** Sensory Trial: Electro-Charged Reactions Record (Single Trial)
*** Hammering Trial: Charged Attacks Record (Single Trial)
*** Frigid Trial: Frozen Reactions Record (Single Trial)
*** Blossoming Trial: Bloom/Hyperbloom Reactions Record (Single Trial)
*** Profusion Trial: Quicken/Aggravate/Spread Reactions Record (Single Trial)
*** Surging Trial: Vaporize Reactions Record (Single Trial)
* During the Final Challenge, opponents' ATK, HP, Physical RES, and All Elemental RES will be weakened based on the number of Ancient Runes activated.

==Trial Characters==
{{Main|Misty Dungeon/2023-11-09/Characters|l1=Characters}}
All Trial Characters are at Level 80 with fixed weapons and artifacts.

==Trials==

;Ley Line Disorder
